con:testCase.name: TC68676
con:testCase.con:description:
Test Case Name: Restructure on AF that has other accounts in arrears
Description: Do a restructure on a AF account that has other accounts in arrears.
Expected Result: Customer has other loans in arrears error message must be displayed, on the Access Facility details screen Y indicator must be displayed next to Suspensive condition and Term loan in arrears
